attributes.action: Limit secondary school weeks to 4 days.
attributes.additional_details: This would help students to catch up on homework and give them additional time to relax and destress. It is a common fact that for some students the overload of school work is health damaging. Therefore, with an extra day of the weekend these students have the chance to catch up on work and have some free time away from school.
attributes.background: Make it compulsory for academic school weeks in secondary schools to be limited to 4 days a week of education.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614046
